title: What a Little Sneeze Will Do

sources.title: What a Little Sneeze Will Do (1941)
sources.description: A Pete Smith-like narrator introduces us to a pig named Oscar who's overwhelmed with advice and useless elixirs to relieve his cold. This leads to his having a nightmare where he's pursued by giant medicine and pill containers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/what-a-little-sneeze-will-do-1941/

metadata.Plot: A Pete Smith-like narrator introduces us to a pig named Oscar who's overwhelmed with advice and useless elixirs to relieve his cold. This leads to his having a nightmare where he's pursued by giant medicine and pill containers.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
